entry.title: Throwing cards away I UVA - 10935
entry.content: 题目就是最基本的队列基本应用 先进先出 被格式卡了一会 主要原因就是1的时候没空格emmmmm绝了 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132#include<iostream>#include<queue>using namespace std;int main(){ int n;// freopen("in","r",stdin); while(cin>>n&&n){ queue<int> q; bool flag=true; for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) q.push(i); cout<<"Discarded cards:"; while(q.size()!=1){ if(flag){ cout<<" "<<q.front(); q.pop(); if(q.size()!=1){ cout<<","; } flag=!flag; } else{ q.push(q.front()); q.pop(); flag=!flag; } } cout<<endl; cout<<"Remaining card: "<<q.front()<<endl; } return 0;}

entry.title: Ducci Sequence UVA - 1594
entry.content: 按照题目来就好了 到1000次时还不全为零那就是循环数列 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546#include <iostream>#include <cmath>using namespace std;#define MAXN 20bool compare(int *a,int *b,int n){ for(int i=0;i<n;i++){ if(a[i]==b[i]) continue; else return false; } return true;}int main() { int n; int T; freopen("test","r",stdin); cin>>T; while(T--) { cin >> n; int exp[MAXN]; int cha[MAXN]; int zero[MAXN]; for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) cin >> exp[i]; for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) cha[i] = exp[i]; for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) zero[i] = 0; int i; for (i = 0; i < 1000; i++) { int x = cha[0]; for (int j = 0; j < n - 3; j++) { cha[j] = abs(cha[j] - cha[(j + 1) % n]); } cha[n - 1] = abs(cha[n - 1] - x); if (compare(cha, zero, n)) { cout << "ZERO" << endl; i = 1005; } } if (i != 1006) cout << "LOOP" << endl; } return 0;}
